pinyin: Tong1 yong4 Qi4 che1 Gong1 si1

definition: to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: At General Motors this summer, I worked as a validation engineer.
sentences.chinese: 今年夏天，我在通用汽车公司，担任验证工程师。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, GM will pay maintenance and other costs.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，通用汽车公司将支付保养费和其他费用。

sentences.english: General Motors Corp. showed off the 2010 GMC Terrain compact crossover vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 通用汽车公司展示了2010通用小型越野跨界车。

sentences.english: General Motors is scaling back plans to produce Cadillacs in China.
sentences.chinese: 通用汽车公司正在计划调低凯迪拉克在中国的产量。

sentences.english: That followed Campbell-Ewald's loss of GM's AC Delco.
sentences.chinese: 而随后又遭受了通用汽车公司AC德科的损失。

sentences.english: And the funeral bells surely tolled this week when General Motors filed for bankruptcy.
sentences.chinese: 本周当通用汽车公司破产时，丧钟必将敲响。

sentences.english: He is the chief pitchman for GM.
sentences.chinese: 他是通用汽车公司首席发言人。

sentences.english: GM says there's no plan to sell an electric Cruze in the U. S.
sentences.chinese: 通用汽车公司说没有计划在美国出售电动科鲁兹。

sentences.english: GM was secretly delighted to be rid of Knudsen.
sentences.chinese: 通用汽车公司对于摆脱掉了努森，暗中感到高兴。

sentences.english: Lutz will retire from General Motors at the end of the year.
sentences.chinese: 卢茨将退出通用汽车公司在今年年底。

pinyin: Ke4 lai2 si1 le4 Qi4 che1 Gong1 si1

definition: Tesla (unit)/Nikola Tesla (1856-1943), Serbian inventor and engineer

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Dian4 hua4 Dian4 bao4 Gong1 si1
Lian2 he2 Ji4 shu4 Gong1 si1
Mei3 guo2 Guo2 ji4 Ji2 tuan2
Ka3 te4 bi3 le4 gong1 si1
